title: Riot is always going to take reddit's opinion over boards.
body: When the top 3 upvoted posts on the front page are all the same shitty jokes about zed being disabled. Boards are a cesspool where all the circlejerkers who can't play against a specific champion go to bitch and moan. You only show up here when you don't like something, reddit is an ongoing community which people check back everyday, not just when they have a problem.

replies.body: When 4chan's /lolgen/ makes more reasonable, comprehensive critiques and ideas than this board then there is a horrible problem but it definitely seems like majority of their time and attention is given to reddit.
I check everyday (NA,EUW,OCE) and you sir are making a QQ thread
You must be pretty bored then. Not really, I'm just letting you know that upvoting trash devalues your own opinion.

> [{quoted}](name=TomA3X,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bhAoE7mh,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-07-14T13:52:18.324+0000)
>
> You must be pretty bored then. Not really, I'm just letting you know that upvoting trash devalues your own opinion.

But who said i upvoted your post or other qq threads? unless its good suggestions (veigar vu updates) then i wont.
Hilarious, you got me, can I not make a post if it doesn't apply to one person?

> [{quoted}](name=TomA3X,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bhAoE7mh,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-14T14:00:14.244+0000)
>
> Hilarious, you got me, can I not make a post if it doesn't apply to one person?

If its a toxic/QQ/singular case (not a bug) then dont.
I'm probably one of the 10 people who visit Reddit and Boards regularly, and i must admit that you are right. A riven/zed/cho'gath qq thread should never ever hit the front page.
Where did you get the idea Riot listens to anyone?

Why did the Zed cross the road?

To get more Freelo, he already took all of it on the of the road he was on.
